hero.top: 新しいダンスの体験を
hero.reason2: 踊りたいダンスを簡単に

about.sub: Vibin is a platform where anyone can meet the dance they truly want.
about.desc: When we listen to music our bodies naturally move and vibe. However, when we don’t know how to dance or when we feel anxious about our dancing skills, we tend to force ourselves to stop our bodies from moving and vibing. That’s why we created a place where anyone can learn how to dance.
about.prob2: It's too scary to go back to dance studios due to the COVID-19
about.prob3: It's difficult to find the dance you love
about.prob4: It’s difficult to stay committed to learning how to dance

whyus.desc1: Access the video you are looking for with just one search
whyus.desc2: Use it as much as you want without caring about your wallet
whyus.desc3: Schedule your time to learn the dream dance moves

features.top: 自分のバイブスを沢山の選択肢から見つけて
features.sub: あなたが踊りたいダンスを4032通りの組み合わせから

calendar.sub2: セッションが予定されてます
